finish_all_goals: For finish plan all goals and actions must be done or suspended
finish_all_suggested: For finish plan all suggested goals and actions must be accepted or rejected
plan_least_one_goal: The plan should have at least one goal
plan_projection_field_old: Now the projection field is required, please, fill this field
plan_goal_date: Your goal ___ requires an estimated date of completion.
goal_date: Your action ___ requires an estimated date of completion.
goal_expired_date: The estimated completion date of your goal ___ has already expired
goal_commitment_expired_date: The estimated completion date of your commitment ____ within your goal ___ has expired.
goal_higher_date: The estimated date of your action cannot be greater than the estimated date of your goal
commitment_text: Review and modify the status or date of the actions defined for today
status_empty_field: You must have all the information of the actions filled out before changing to this finalized
status_text: You cannot change the state of the skill until all its actions are finished or suspended
